p: The outbreak rapidly spread from the Wuhan City, Hubei Province, China, where the first cases of SARS-CoV-2 infection occurred in early December 2019, toward western countries, resulting in an unprecedented challenge for the health systems worldwide. On 11th March 2020, the World Health Organization declared the outbreak of SARS-CoV-2 a pandemic. As of the 8th of July 2020 globally more than 11 million cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections had been confirmed, and 545,398 COVID-19 related fatalities had occurred globally [ 2].
